title: Right side of my League disappears New client
body: Every time i log in the whole right side of my screen disappears when i try and move it to the left please help and when i do log in the social tab disapears pease help.

replies.body: Your client may be too big!  Try scaling down on your keyboard by tapping Ctrl + Down Arrow.  Let me know if that helps!

It's not that.  My wife plays on a tablet sometimes as well as a low spec laptop.  The bug happens every time, so the new client is no longer playable for her.  Since it removes the right side, she also can't tell it to download the legacy client... so basically she can't play league of legends anymore on a laptop/tablet.
